## AssociationDefinition.sourceName property

The source class of the association. This is the side that defines the association in the Alfresco datamodel.

For a source-target association, this is the source. For a parent-child association, this is the parent.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly sourceName: QNameWithTypeTag<QNameTypeTag.CLASS>;
```
